title: FreeBSD requires Nix for Rocq 9.1
description: FreeBSD pkg only has Coq 8.20.1, but rocq-transformer needs Rocq 9.1. Updated Makefile with better error message and added FreeBSD section to README.md.
close_reason: Implemented Makefile fallback and added FreeBSD documentation

title: Add GitHub Actions CI with Nix
description: Set up CI pipeline using Nix flake to build and verify all modules on push/PR

title: Add semantic axioms for softmax/layernorm
description: Prove softmax outputs sum to 1, layernorm produces unit variance

title: Add Coq extraction to OCaml
description: Extract structural operations to executable OCaml code
